name: Amazing Human Simulator
description: Do you like destruction? Then let's enjoy destruction to the utmost!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core2Duo that's all Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX660 or RadeonHD7000 that's all Storage: 600 MB available space
